content:
You're welcome! Toasting the walnuts and soaking the chia seeds will definitely bring out their flavors and textures, and they'll pair perfectly with your oatmeal and coffee.

Remember to store your toasted walnuts and soaked chia seeds in airtight containers to keep them fresh, and feel free to experiment with different toasting times and soaking ratios to find your perfect combination.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to ask. Otherwise, enjoy your delicious and nutritious oatmeal with walnuts and chia seeds, and happy sipping on that cup of coffee!

Have a fantastic day, and happy breakfasting!
